Interface OnDiskBuildInfo

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultOnDiskBuildInfo

    public interface OnDiskBuildInfo

      Optional<Sha1HashCode> getHash(String key) 
      List<String> getOutputFileContentsByLine(Buildable buildable)
      Invokes the Buildable.getPathToOutputFile() method of the specified Buildable, reads the file at the specified path, and returns the list of lines in the file.

    • Method Detail

      • getValue

        Optional<String> getValue(String key)
        Returns:
        the value associated with the specified key, if it exists.

      • getValues

        Optional<ImmutableList<String>> getValues(String key)
        Returns:
        the sequence of values associated with the specified key, if it exists.

      • getHash

        Optional<Sha1HashCode> getHash(String key)
        Returns:
        Assuming the value associated with the specified key is a valid sha1 hash, returns it as a Sha1HashCode, if it exists.

      • getRuleKey

        Optional<RuleKey> getRuleKey()
        Returns the RuleKey for the rule whose output is currently stored on disk.

        This value would have been written the last time the rule was built successfully.

      • getRuleKeyWithoutDeps

        Optional<RuleKey> getRuleKeyWithoutDeps()
        Returns the RuleKey without deps for the rule whose output is currently stored on disk.

        This value would have been written the last time the rule was built successfully.

      • getOutputFileContentsByLine

        List<String> getOutputFileContentsByLine(Buildable buildable)
                                         throws IOException
        Invokes the Buildable.getPathToOutputFile() method of the specified Buildable, reads the file at the specified path, and returns the list of lines in the file.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getOutputFileContentsByLine

        List<String> getOutputFileContentsByLine(Path path)
                                         throws IOException
        Throws:
        IOException

      • makeOutputFileExecutable

        void makeOutputFileExecutable(Buildable buildable)
                              throws IOException
        Sets the executable flag on the given buildable's output file. Used to work around an issue where executable flags aren't preserved when uploading to cache.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • deleteExistingMetadata

        void deleteExistingMetadata()
                            throws IOException
        Throws:
        IOException
